name: Picross 3D Round 2
synopsis: Picross has a fresh new layer of paint—and strategy! Chip away at a three-dimensional block puzzle to reveal the object hidden within. Only this time, blocks can be painted with two colors of paint to mold detailed shapes. Enjoy more than 300 puzzles at the Café or even tap amiibo figures to solve 10 more puzzles hiding secret Nintendo characters! In the Café, the more puzzles you complete, the more that open up to play. Accomplish certain objectives, like getting a high ranking on 30 puzzles, and you’ll earn even more. You can choose between easy, medium, and hard difficulty levels for each one, but no matter the complexity, you’ll always be rewarded with the hidden object. Some sets of puzzles offer additional tasks, from Timed Challenges to One-Chance Challenges. With this many brainteasing activities, there are always new risks to take and hidden objects to find!
